cancellationPolicies.label: Free Cancellation rates
cancellationPolicies.description: If you cancel your booking before 23:59 17th Oct 2025 (AEST) your deposit will be refunded to your payment card. If you cancel after 23:59 17th Oct 2025 (AEST) or in the event of a no-show, your deposit will not be refunded and the total of the first night's accommodation will be charged to your payment card, unless otherwise stated (see 'Things to Note' information). Please note that cancellations must be made directly within your booking in My Account.

dorms.name: 6 Bed Mixed Dorm
dorms.description: Dormitory style and range in size from 2 beds upwards.  They offer mixed accommodation.
dorms.labelDescription: Our 6 Bed Mix Dorm has 3 capsule bunk bed. Provided is clean, fresh linen, and free unlimited WiFi, Airconditioning, and the ultimate comfort with our newly refurnished pod beds complete with personal fans, light and usb charging point.

paymentProcedure.label: Deposit only
paymentProcedure.description:
Deposit only
Your deposit will be non-refundable unless the Standard Flexible Booking option is available and you select it. T&C apply.

dorms.description: Dormitory style and range in size from 2 beds upwards.  They offer mixed accommodation.

dorms.labelDescription: Our FEMALE ONLY 4 Bed Dormitory has 2 capsule king single bunk beds. We provide clean, fresh linen free unlimited WiFi, Airconditioning, and the ultimate comfort with our newly refurbished pod beds complete with personal fans, light and usb charging point

dorms.name: Standard 4 Bed Mixed Dorm Ensuite
dorms.description: Dormitory style and range in size from 2 beds upwards.  They offer mixed accommodation.
dorms.labelDescription: Our 4 Bed Mix Dormitory has 2 capsule bunk bed and a private bathroom for room guests only.. Provided is clean fresh linen, WiFi, AC, and the ultimate comfort with our newly refurnished pod beds complete with personal fans, light and usb charging point

privates.name: Standard Single Private Shared Bathroom
privates.description: Private Room with 1 single bed, sleeps one person.
privates.labelDescription: small and cosy this single bed 1 guest only room is the perfect budget friendly choice for a little privacy. including wifi, AC, fresh linen, lamp and clothes hanging space.

paymentProcedure.label: Deposit only
paymentProcedure.description:
Deposit only
Your deposit will be non-refundable unless the Standard Flexible Booking option is available and you select it. T&C apply.

privates.name: Standard Double Bed Private Shared Bathroom
privates.description: In order to secure a Private Room, you will need to book the entire room.
privates.labelDescription: Double Private room a little taste of privacy and comfort on a budget. This room includes free wifi, AC, fresh linen, reading chair, lamp  and clothes hanging space.

rateRuleViolationsMessages.description: Requires a minimum of 2 nights stay on your dates
